alert.note: Alert for Central Aleutians; Western Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued September 15 at 8:09PM AKDT until September 16 at 7:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 45 to 65 mph with gusts up to 90 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Aleutians and Western Aleutians. * WHEN...Until 7 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose objects, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A powerful storm system, now the extra- tropical remnants of Typhoon Merbok, is currently over the Western Aleutians. South to southwest winds will continue to increase, peaking late tonight. The core of strongest winds are expected east of Attu island and west of Adak. Adak and east will likely see gusts up to 75 mph. Winds will switch to the west by Friday morning, with winds diminishing through Friday as the low continues moving north.
info.instruction: If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
